scripts.clean: rimraf build build-m3 dist; npm run ets:clean
scripts.build:arkui-common: npm run unmemoize && npm run build:arkui-common:inc
scripts.build:arkui-common:inc: npm run unmemoize && node ../../ui2abc/fast-arktsc --config ./arktsconfig.json --compiler ../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/arktsc --link-name ./build/arkui-common.abc && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build/abc/build.ninja
scripts.build:arkui-common:inc:ui2abc: npm run annotate && node ../../ui2abc/fast-arktsc --config ./ui2abcconfig.json --compiler ../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ui2abc --link-name ./build-m3/arkui-common.abc --restart-stages && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build-m3/build.ninja
scripts.build:arkui-common:inc:ui2abc:recheck: npm run annotate && node ../../ui2abc/fast-arktsc --config ./ui2abcconfig.json --compiler ../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ui2abc --link-name ./build-m3/arkui-common.abc && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build-m3/build.ninja
scripts.ohos-sdk: npm run ohos-sdk:download && npm run ohos-sdk:patch && npm run interface-sdk:download
scripts.test-gen: npm run compile && npm run ets:test && mocha --gen-golden=$npm_config_gdir
scripts.test: npm run compile && TS_NODE_PROJECT=./test/tsconfig.json mocha -r tsconfig-paths/register
